Articles.Content:
I just got the game and it worked just fine for the past hour and when I tried to go to the VAB from the runway for the 30th time, it just kept loading. I have restarted my system, relaunched, reinstalled and created new expeditions but it still gets stuck... any help would be great.

 

I get stuck on "Pumping Sim Once" then after a while it goes to this screen:

https://imgur.com/a/0kERGhE
